mapper.select: SELECT g.register_area name,g.register_area `value` FROM (select count(register_area) counts ,register_area FROM `meta_financing` WHERE register_area is not NULL and register_area != "" GROUP BY register_area ) g ORDER BY counts DESC limit 0,12
